data.title: Library for the Blind and Print Disabled
images: https://cmpl.org/services_specialties/Images/Services Specialties/Adults/Library for the Blind Redirect/Library for the Blind/MLBPD-Logo.jpg
https://cmpl.org/services_specialties/Images/Services Specialties/Adults/Library for the Blind Redirect/Library for the Blind/Digital-Players-300x200.jpg
data.text:
For more information about any of the materials and services listed, please call us 586-286-1580 or toll free 1-855-203-5274, or email us and we will give you the details.

Book Discussions. We offer a monthly book discussion that you can participate in by phone. This is a great way to get involved in a lively book discussion with other LBPD patrons without even leaving your home! It is easy to join. Just call us at the library.

Assistive Technology Tutoring. If you have assistive technology questions regarding Windows-based computers or Apple personal devices, we can arrange for you to speak with our technology tutor over the phone.

Vision Network Group. Patrons and a facilitator talk about issues related to vision challenges as a group by phone.

Braille embosser (Duxbury Software)

Adapted computer workstation (JAWS, ZoomText)

Large print books

Email us
